name: places/ChIJdU3Z9whZwokRxToV6VC5hxs
adrFormatAddress: 427 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I am never going back to this place!!! I got a pedicure which was decent and a white color gel manicure which was horrible. It changed/lost the color the same night I got it done. They were hurting me while doing it & didn't care at all. They charged me so much & took a mandatory high tip. They were rude as well.

text.text: I am never going back to this place!!! I got a pedicure which was decent and a white color gel manicure which was horrible. It changed/lost the color the same night I got it done. They were hurting me while doing it & didn't care at all. They charged me so much & took a mandatory high tip. They were rude as well.

originalText.text: This nail salon offers powder dip and nail art so if you are in the market for either of those this may be a good spot. I was disappointed in my Gel Manicure. The lady did not cut or even push back my cuticles (which is something I value) after I requested she please do several times she still did not. I felt very rushed. Additionally I would have preferred they not use the electric tool to take off my gel - it can damage your nails. Mostly, I was bummed that she didn't paint down to the base of my nail bed and that the nails look really thick and uneven. It was a $39 rush job

originalText.text: This place is the absolute BEST!!! You haven’t lived in NYC unless you’ve had a manicure by Vicky with nail art! She is so meticulous and can create almost anything your heart desires! Joy is my favorite! She is an expert at nails and gives the best head and neck massages!!! My husband and all my friends love Color Nails Bar. Definitely a must try! I’ve been a regular for 5 years and 8 years with these two ladies!! Love love love them!

text.text: This place is the absolute BEST!!! You haven’t lived in NYC unless you’ve had a manicure by Vicky with nail art! She is so meticulous and can create almost anything your heart desires! Joy is my favorite! She is an expert at nails and gives the best head and neck massages!!! My husband and all my friends love Color Nails Bar. Definitely a must try! I’ve been a regular for 5 years and 8 years with these two ladies!! Love love love them!

originalText.text: The managers are so sweet and truly have a zeal to know their customers. I am always pleased with my nails. Vicki and Joy do an amazing job of leading their team, using quality products (my nails last 5 weeks +), having a pleasant culture in the space and ensuring great service! Plus they can do soooo many great designs!

text.text: The managers are so sweet and truly have a zeal to know their customers. I am always pleased with my nails. Vicki and Joy do an amazing job of leading their team, using quality products (my nails last 5 weeks +), having a pleasant culture in the space and ensuring great service! Plus they can do soooo many great designs!

originalText.text:
Pros: cheap - regular polish manicure + pedicure + 10 min massage =  $55.50, nice shaping by Vicky (the nicest person in there), feet are well taken care of.
Cons: no soaking dish or hydrating cream and most importantly,  nail polish on my fingers shows cracking and bubbles right after I left (note; the middle fingers chipping are my fault, the other fingers are clearly not well polished). I could have done better on my own.

Also, I didn't appreciate the "pressure" into paying a 20% tip (3 of them surrounded me and pushed me into doing so). Being French but having lived in the US for 5 years, I understand the importance of tips for services, but unless specified on the website or in the store (ex. "20% gratuity included"), the final choice must be up to us  - I would have gone with 10-15% given the choice and since I was not thrilled with the results on my hands
